item.title: Comptroller warns about workforce purge excess, plans probe of actions
item.description: Washington’s chief auditor says Trump’s federal worker firings should be done in a respectful, dignified way and not cause greater risks to the govern...

item.title: National Democratic committees to stage town halls in House GOP districts
item.description: The national tour suggests the national party is responding to its voters’ desire for a more confrontational approach to President Donald Trump.

item.title: How Trump uses the power of names to impose his story of America
item.description: From military bases to wildlife refuges, a president who specializes in branding is renaming things to make a point.

item.title: Trump’s fantastical claim of a $200 billion ‘subsidy’ to Canada
item.description: No matter how we do the math, the numbers don’t add up.

item.title: JD Vance booed as he arrives at Kennedy Center concert
item.description: The reaction toward the vice president comes on the heels of recent steps by the Trump administration to overhaul the national arts institution in D.C...
